data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carvalho, Ismar De Souza, Vasconcellos, Felipe Mesquita De, Tavares, Sandra Apare- Cida Simionato (2007): Montealtosuchus arrudacamposi, a new peirosaurid crocodile (Mesoeucrocodylia) from the Late Cretaceous Adamantina Formation of Brazil. Zootaxa 1607: 35-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.178833
